**Government Tender Announcement: Simultaneous Interpretation Services**
===============

**Solicitation Number**: 20230326
**Reference Number**: cb-6561-62895989
**Publication Date**: June 19, 2023

**Objective**
------------

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) invites bidders to provide professional services for simultaneous interpretation services for virtual meetings and events. Prior to awarding a contract, we will provide other suppliers with an opportunity to demonstrate that they are capable of satisfying the requirements outlined in this notice.

**Details**
------------

The proposed contract is for a period of one (1) year, from September 1, 2023 to August 30, 2024, with four (4) option periods to extend the contract for up to a period of one (1) year each.

**Requirements**
----------------

To be considered, suppliers must demonstrate that they meet the following requirements:

* Ability to provide interpretation services on a regular basis, in French-to-English and English-to-French, via Zoom or other acceptable platforms.
* Ability to provide simultaneous interpretation for concurrent meetings and events.
* Ability to provide short-notice interpretation services within three (3) days.
* Ability to conduct a large volume of simultaneous interpretations per month, with a minimum of 10 interpretations per month.

**Assessment Criteria**
-----------------------

Supplier statements of capabilities will be evaluated based on the above requirements.
